title: Etno Grupa Vrelo
description:
The traditional music substance is no longer used as the basic element of their work, but they combine it with other modern music and stage forms. The minimalistic approach, simplificaton and nakedness of the expression through only two instruments (bass guitar and drums) and backing tracks + loops at one side, and several female voices which move between old, inherited patterns and modern expresion on the other side, make VRELO a part of the world music by relying on the identity and authenticity of Slavic music.
